Prompt: Find the person node named 'Tom Hanks'.
Canonical Solution: MATCH (tom:Person) WHERE tom.name = 'Tom Hanks' RETURN tom

Prompt: Find the movie node titled 'Cloud Atlas'.
Find the names of 10 people.
Find the titles of movies released in the 1990s.
Canonical Solution: MATCH (nineties:Movie) WHERE nineties.released >= 1990 AND nineties.released < 2000 RETURN nineties.title

Prompt: List the titles of all 'Tom Hanks' movies.
Who directed 'Cloud Atlas'. Return the name.
Find all movies' titles that 'Tom Hanks' acted in and for each movie retrieved, also find the people's name who acted in that movie.
Canonical Solution: MATCH (tom:Person {name: 'Tom Hanks'})-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)<-[:ACTED_IN]-(coactor:Person) RETURN m.title, collect(DISTINCT coactor.name) AS coactors

Prompt: Find the relationships to and from the Cloud Atlas movie and return the name of the person, the type of the relationship and the properties for the relationship.
Canonical Solution: MATCH (people:Person)-[relatedTo]-(:Movie {title: 'Cloud Atlas'}) RETURN people.name, type(relatedTo), relatedTo

Prompt: Find all movies and/or people nodes who are up to 3 hops away from 'Kevin Bacon' in the graph.
Canonical Solution: MATCH path = (:Person {name: 'Kevin Bacon'})-[*1..3]-(node) RETURN DISTINCT node

Prompt: Find the shortest path between 'Kevin Bacon' and 'Meg Ryan' in the graph.
Canonical Solution: MATCH p=shortestPath((bacon:Person {name:'Kevin Bacon'})-[*]-(meg:Person {name:'Meg Ryan'})) RETURN p

Prompt: Count all nodes.
Find all movies' titles reviewed by a person named 'Angela Scope'.
Find all movies' titles and released years produced by a person named 'Stefan Arndt'.
Find all movies' titles directed by a person who acted in a movie with a person named 'Ed Harris'.
Find all movies' titles written by a person named 'Lilly Wachowski'.
Find all person nodes followed by a person named 'James Thompson'.
Find all people's names who have acted in the movie titled 'The Matrix'.
Find all people's names who have directed the movie with the tagline 'Welcome to the Real World'.
Canonical Solution: MATCH (:Movie {tagline: 'Welcome to the Real World'})<-[:DIRECTED]-(p:Person) RETURN p.name

Prompt: Find all people's names who have produced the movie titled 'The Matrix'.
Find all people's names who have written the movie titled 'Top Gun'.
Find all people's names who have reviewed a movie released in 2000 with a rating greater than 4.
Canonical Solution: MATCH (p:Person)-[r:REVIEWED]-(m:Movie) WHERE m.released = 2000 AND r.rating > 4 RETURN DISTINCT p.name

Prompt: Find all movies' titles with the tagline 'The rest of his life begins now.' and their respective reviewers' names.
Canonical Solution: MATCH (m:Movie {tagline: 'The rest of his life begins now.'})<-[r:REVIEWED]-(reviewer) RETURN m.title, reviewer.name

Prompt: Find all movies' titles released in 2000 and their directors' names.
Find all distinct movies' titles where a person both produced and wrote.
Find all movies' titles where a person both acted in and directed.
Find all movies' titles released in 2000 and their respective reviewers' ratings.
Find all movies' titles where a person both acted in and directed with their roles and names.
Find all movies where a person both acted in and directed with their titles and taglines.
Find all people's names who have acted in at least two movies.
Canonical Solution: MATCH (p:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie) WITH p, COUNT(m) AS movies_count WHERE movies_count >= 2 RETURN p.name

Prompt: Find all people's names who have directed more than one movie.
Canonical Solution: MATCH (p:Person)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie) WITH p, COUNT(m) AS directed_count WHERE directed_count > 1 RETURN p.name

Prompt: Find all people's names who have produced exactly two movies.
Canonical Solution: MATCH (p:Person)-[:PRODUCED]->(m:Movie) WITH p, COUNT(m) AS produced_count WHERE produced_count = 2 RETURN p.name

Prompt: Find all people's names who have written less than five movies.
Canonical Solution: MATCH (p:Person)-[:WROTE]->(m:Movie) WITH p, COUNT(m) AS written_count WHERE written_count < 5 RETURN p.name

Prompt: Find all people's names who have reviewed more than four movies.
Canonical Solution: MATCH (p:Person)-[:REVIEWED]->(m:Movie) WITH p, COUNT(m) AS reviewed_count WHERE reviewed_count > 4 RETURN p.name

Prompt: Find all distinct movies' titles produced by people born before 1970.
Canonical Solution: MATCH (p:Person)-[:PRODUCED]->(m:Movie) WHERE p.born < 1970 RETURN DISTINCT m.title

Prompt: Find all movies' titles directed by people born between 1950 and 1960.
Canonical Solution: MATCH (p:Person)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie) WHERE p.born >= 1950 AND p.born < 1960 RETURN m.title

Prompt: Find all distinct movies' titles acted in by people born before 1990.
Canonical Solution: MATCH (p:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie) WHERE p.born < 1990 RETURN DISTINCT m.title
